mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tiekuai.t_integral_product ( create_by, create_time, online_time, product_name, product_type, product_price, inventory, image1, image2, description, content ) VALUES ( #{create_by}, #{create_time}, #{online_time}, #{product_name}, #{product_type}, #{product_price}, #{inventory}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{description}, #{content} );
mapper.update: UPDATE tiekuai.t_integral_product SET update_by = #{update_by}, update_time = #{update_time}, online_time = #{online_time}, product_name = #{product_name}, product_type = #{product_type}, product_price = #{product_price}, inventory = #{inventory}, image1 = #{image1}, image2 = #{image2}, description = #{description}, content = #{content} WHERE id=#{id};

UPDATE tiekuai.t_integral_product SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE status = 0 AND id in
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tiekuai.t_integral_product WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT a.product_name, a.id, a.product_price, a.inventory, a.image1, a.image2, a.product_type, a.inventory-ifnull(b.count,0) less FROM t_integral_product a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT order_from, sum(order_count) count FROM t_integral_order GROUP BY order_from ) b on a.id=b.order_from where a.`status`=1 and a.product_name LIKE #{name} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.product_name, a.id, a.product_price, a.image1, a.image2, a.product_type, a.inventory-ifnull(b.count,0) AS inventory, a.online_time, a.description, a.content FROM t_integral_product a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT order_from, sum(order_count) count FROM t_integral_order GROUP BY order_from ) b on a.id=b.order_from where a.`status`=1 AND a.is_deleted = 0 and a.id = #{id}
